overview: Driveshaft presents Shower Bait 6. Casey Everett and Jack Andy: "Why don't you join me for a shower and please drop the soap!" Carson Cruise and Topher DiMaggio: This is one hot and steamy humping between two gay lovers. Tony Shore and Billy Santoro: A little shower time between friends can be great for your relationship. Peter Marcus and Jack Hunter: Ass eating and showering, what's not to like?
title: Shower Bait 6
